377420.name: Close Your Eyes - Goodie Bag
377420.description:
The Goodie Bag DLC is a collection of additional goodies for Close Your Eyes, mainly made as a way for people who want to support the game to do so with a few extra incentives thrown in.

Includes:

  • Various old builds of Close Your Eyes and Girl's Graveyard. It includes Close Your Eyes Ludum Dare Version (April 2014), Close Your Eyes Original Redux Version (April 2015), Close Your Eyes Redux Final Expansion Beta (August 2015), Close Your Eyes Remake Version 0.01 (January 2018), Girl's Graveyard Original (October 2013), and Girl's Graveyard Redux Version (December 2014). Each are playable, show the evolutions and differences between versions of the game.

  • Artwork collection, including all the artwork used in the game, as well as unused pieces, concept sketches, alternate art pieces, and more. In total, it includes 59 "in-game" pieces, 18 scrapped art pieces, 41 concept art pieces, 6 wallpapers, 52 alternate versions of pieces, as well as the art used for the Steam badges and emotes.

  • The original soundtrack, composed of 43 songs and about 72 minutes of music.

To access the Goodie Bag DLC, look for it in your Steamapps 'Close Your Eyes' folder. It's in a folder in the game files titled, "GOODIE BAG DLC BONUSES".
377420.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
